hero.heading: Flawless Skin Made Easy

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Smooth skin, remove blemishes, enhance skin tone...

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Skin Retouching?
features.description: Our cutting-edge technology delivers stunning skin enhancements effortlessly.

items.title: Fast Results
items.description: Experience rapid enhancements with our advanced AI algorithms that process images in seconds.

items.title: User-Friendly
items.description: No editing skills needed. Just upload your photo and watch as our AI transforms it.

items.title: Safe and Secure
items.description: Your images are processed privately in your browser, ensuring complete security.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Achieve flawless results in three simple steps

items.title: Upload Your Photo
items.description: Easily upload your portrait by dragging and dropping or browsing files. We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Skin Retouching
items.description: Our sophisticated AI automatically analyzes and smooths out skin blemishes while enhancing tone.

items.title: Download Your Portrait
items.description: Preview your enhanced portrait with our comparison slider and download your stunning image in high quality.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonial.description: Join the community of happy users achieving stunning portraits with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: I couldn’t believe the difference! Skin imperfections erased in seconds—absolutely love it!

items.name: Liam Rodriguez
items.comment: As a portrait photographer, this tool has saved me so much time and added unbelievable value to my work.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about AI Skin Retouching

items.title: What can this feature do for my portraits?
items.description: The skin retouching feature can smooth out imperfections, remove blemishes and wrinkles, and enhance overall skin tone for a polished look.

items.title: Is it free to use?
items.description: Yes! You receive 30 free credits daily, allowing ample opportunity to retouch your photos. Additional credits can be earned through engagement on our platform.

items.title: Can I use the retouched images commercially?
items.description: Absolutely! Paid subscribers can use retouched images for commercial projects. Free users can use them for personal projects only.

items.title: How do you ensure privacy?
items.description: All processing occurs in your browser, ensuring your images are never stored or uploaded to servers. Your privacy is our top priority.

footer.heading: Ready to Achieve Flawless Skin in Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see the difference for yourself. No sign-up required.
